text: Iain Somerled MacDonald MacCormick (28 September 1939 - 19 September 2014) was a Scottish politician. He was a member of the Scottish National Party (SNP). He was MP for Argyllshire from 28 February 1974 until 7 April 1979. He was also a member of the Social Democratic Party (SDP) from 1981 until 1988. MacCormick was educated in Glasgow. He also worked as a high school teacher in his town. MacCormick died on 19 September 2014 in Oban, Argyll and Bute, aged 74. The day before he voted in the Scottish independence referendum. ==References== ==Other websites== * Iain MacCormick at TheyWorkForYou Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British teachers Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Scottish National Party MPs Category:Politicians from Argyll and Bute Category:Social Democratic Party (UK) people
title: Iain MacCormick
